member.name: MENUITEMTEMPLATEHEADER
member.summary: Defines the header for a menu template. A complete menu template consists of a header and one or more menu item lists.

member.name: MENUITEMTEMPLATEHEADER.versionNumber
member.summary: The version number. This member must be zero.

member.name: MENUITEMTEMPLATEHEADER.offset
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, from the end of the header. The menu item list begins at this offset. Usually, this member is zero, and the menu item list follows immediately after the header.
